article.title: Tapestry Solutions Provides Simulation in Europe and Africa
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Tapestry Solutions Incorporated, San Diego, California, was awarded an approximate $11 million firm-fixed-price, cost-reimbursable contract for the managing and operating battle simulation training services for U.S. Army Europe and U.S. Army Africa.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Grafenwoehr, Germany, is the contracting activity.
